<#include "../support/bean.html"> <@page_overview_title/> <@groovy> def ouputstring="" <@bean_inspect_gc "arch,name,version"/> return ouputstring <#macro bean_inspect_gc field_includes> import org.xdir.platform.util.bean.BeanUtil import org.xdir.platform.util.io.FileUtil mbean=java.lang.management.ManagementFactory.garbageCollectorMXBeans ouputstring="$ouputstring" mbean.each{gc -> ouputstring="$ouputstring" if(gc.lastGcInfo!=null){ lastGcInfo=gc.lastGcInfo ouputstring="$ouputstring " ouputstring="$ouputstring " }else{ ouputstring="$ouputstring " } ouputstring="$ouputstring" } ouputstring="$ouputstring
NameTime (millis)CountLast: IDDurationMemory Usages (Before / Delta)
"+gc.name+""+gc.collectionTime+""+gc.collectionCount+""+lastGcInfo.id+""+lastGcInfo.duration+"" ouputstring="$ouputstring " beforeGc=lastGcInfo.memoryUsageBeforeGc afterGc=lastGcInfo.memoryUsageAfterGc beforeGc.keySet().each{ ouputstring="$ouputstring" delta=afterGc[it].init-beforeGc[it].init ouputstring="$ouputstring" delta=afterGc[it].max-beforeGc[it].max ouputstring="$ouputstring" delta=afterGc[it].used-beforeGc[it].used ouputstring="$ouputstring" delta=afterGc[it].committed-beforeGc[it].committed ouputstring="$ouputstring" } ouputstring="$ouputstring
Nameinitmaxusedcommitted
"+it+""+FileUtil.byteCountToDisplaySize(beforeGc[it].init)+""+FileUtil.byteCountToDisplaySize(beforeGc[it].max)+"
"+(delta>0?"+":(delta<0?"":""))+FileUtil.byteCountToDisplaySize(delta)+"		"+FileUtil.byteCountToDisplaySize(beforeGc[it].used)+"
"+(delta>0?"+":(delta<0?"":""))+FileUtil.byteCountToDisplaySize(delta)+"		"+FileUtil.byteCountToDisplaySize(beforeGc[it].committed)+"
"+(delta>0?"+":(delta<0?"":""))+FileUtil.byteCountToDisplaySize(delta)+"
